tasks.task_description: Analyze marketplace catalog Lambda function code structure
Examine how catalog generates solution URLs and authentication parameters
Check user authentication/session handling in catalog endpoint
Identify where tier information should be retrieved and passed
Test current catalog response format and URL generation
Verify other solution integrations aren't affected by potential fix
Implement minimal fix to pass tier=pro parameter
Validate fix works without breaking existing flows

description: Investigate marketplace catalog authentication flow issue - tier=pro not being passed to FAISS application
context: Analyzed catalog Lambda function - it only returns solution metadata from marketplace-solutions table, doesn't handle user authentication or generate URLs with tier parameters. The function is purely a data retrieval service.

Found the root cause! AWS Solution Finder has externalUrl: https://awssolutionfinder.solutions.cloudnestle.com/search - this is a direct link without any authentication parameters. The catalog Lambda only returns static solution metadata, it doesn't handle user authentication or generate personalized URLs with tier information.
